Package soen6441.team01.warzone.model

Class Map

java.lang.Object
soen6441.team01.warzone.model.Map
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMapModel, IMapModelView
public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMapModel, IMapModelView
Manages Warzone Maps. Maps are basically composed of continents, countries and the links (ie neighbors) between countries.

    • getContinents

      public java.util.ArrayList<IContinentModel> getContinents()

      the current list of continents defined on the map

    • getCountries

      public java.util.ArrayList<ICountryModel> getCountries()
      Returns:
      the current list of countries defined on the map

    • addContinent

      public IContinentModel addContinent​(int p_continent_id, java.lang.String p_continent_name, int p_extra_army) throws java.lang.Exception
      Add a continent to the current map
      Specified by:
      addContinent in interface IMapModel
      Parameters:
      p_continent_id - a unique continent identifier
      p_continent_name - the name of the continent
      p_extra_army - the number of extra armies to assign if player has all countries
      Returns:
      the created continent
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when there is an exception

    • addCountry

      public ICountryModel addCountry​(int p_country_id, java.lang.String p_country_name, IContinentModel p_continent, int p_x, int p_y) throws java.lang.Exception
      Add a country to the current map
      Specified by:
      addCountry in interface IMapModel
      Parameters:
      p_country_id - a unique country identifier
      p_country_name - the name of the country
      p_continent - the associated continent
      p_x - the x coordinate as defined in the map file
      p_y - the y coordinate as defined in the map file
      Returns:
      the created country
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - when there is an exception

    • loadMap

      public void loadMap​(java.lang.String p_map_filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Loads a Warzone map from an existing "domination" style map file. The following link describes the format of the "domination" map file : http://domination.sourceforge.net/makemaps.shtml
      Parameters:
      p_map_filename - the filename of the "domination" map file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when there is a problem processing the map file
